bdy.p:
The Broken Coin is a
1915
adventure- mystery film serial directed by
Francis Ford
. This serial is presumed to be
lost
.1

list.entry: John Ford - Sacchio's Accomplice (as Jack Ford)
Lew Short - Prime Minister (as Lewis Short)
